description.en: Vegetable Biryani - a classic mediterranean dish.
description.zh: Vegetable Biryani - a classic mediterranean dish.
description.sv: Vegetable Biryani - a classic mediterranean dish.

en: 200 g rice
1 pc onion
100 g mixed vegetables
zh: 200 g 米饭
1 pc 洋葱
100 g mixed vegetables
sv: 200 g ris
1 pc lök
100 g mixed vegetables

en: Prepare the main ingredients: rice, onion, mixed vegetables.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Serve immediately with rice or bread.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
zh: Prepare the main ingredients: 米饭, 洋葱, mixed vegetables.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Serve immediately with 米饭 or bread.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
sv: Prepare the main ingredients: ris, lök, mixed vegetables.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Serve immediately with ris or bread.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

description.en: Mushroom Risotto - a classic latin america dish.
description.zh: 蘑菇 Risotto - a classic latin america dish.
description.sv: svamp Risotto - a classic latin america dish.

en: 300 g arborio rice
1 L chicken broth
100 g mushrooms
zh: 300 g arborio 米饭
1 L 鸡肉 broth
100 g 蘑菇s
sv: 300 g arborio ris
1 L kyckling broth
100 g svamps

en: Prepare the main ingredients: arborio rice, chicken broth, mushrooms.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Garnish with fresh herbs and a squeeze of lemon.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
zh: Prepare the main ingredients: arborio 米饭, 鸡肉 broth, 蘑菇s.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Garnish with fresh herbs and a squeeze of 柠檬.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
sv: Prepare the main ingredients: arborio ris, kyckling broth, svamps.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Garnish with fresh herbs and a squeeze of citron.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

description.en: Classic Carbonara - a classic europe dish.

description.sv: Classic Carbonara - a classic europe dish.

en: 200 g spaghetti
100 g pancetta
2 pcs egg
zh: 200 g spaghetti
100 g pancetta
2 pcs 鸡蛋
sv: 200 g spaghetti
100 g pancetta
2 pcs ägg

en: Prepare the main ingredients: spaghetti, pancetta, egg.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Rest the cooked dish for a few minutes before serving.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

en: 200 g flour
100 g butter
200 ml milk
zh: 200 g 面粉
100 g 黄油
200 ml 牛奶
sv: 200 g mjöl
100 g smör
200 ml mjölk

en: Prepare the main ingredients: flour, butter, milk.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Preheat the oven or pan to the required temperature.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
